issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.93 (foreground color: #5865f2, background color: #ebedf1, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.93:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fbfdff.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.93:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fbfdff.

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.24:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #088a00.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.24:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #088a00.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > section > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(3)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.93 (foreground color: #5865f2, background color: #ebedf1, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark
issues.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level

any.message: The contentinfo landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.html: Privacy policy About Incel Wiki Disclaimers Mobile view
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The contentinfo landmark is contained in another landmark.

issues.title: This form does not contain a submit button, which creates issues for those who cannot submit the form using the keyboard. Submit buttons are INPUT elements with type attribute "submit" or "image", or BUTTON elements with type "submit" or omitted/invalid.

original_issue.message: This form does not contain a submit button, which creates issues for those who cannot submit the form using the keyboard. Submit buttons are INPUT elements with type attribute "submit" or "image", or BUTTON elements with type "submit" or omitted/invalid.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > form

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (184px by 23.6px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 23.2px instead of at least 24px.
